body.p: We leave to night for the South to see if any way can be devised to get the money to pay you. never in my life have I been this troubled in not being able to pay a debt. Every resort of mine has been exercised to raise the money, and the first-time for Twenty five years I have failed rest ashured as son as. It can be got- by sale of. any property It shall come if not collected from others that owe me.
